argument.description: The type of an expression. The possibilities are:

page.description: Returns the data type of the the value.
page.discussion: TYPEOF() returns the type of an Expression.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script displays the type of a variable.
section.example: type = typeof(testVariable) ui_msg_box("Type","Type of variable is: " + type)

section.description: Beware that character strings that exceed 1,023 characters will be returned as blobs.
section.example: dim x as C ? typeof(x) = "C" x = replicate("x", 1024) ? typeof(x) = "B"
